I received so many compliments when I wore it at the beach (in the winter-it was low 60's). Held up well in several washes and even put it in the dryer, did not shrink. I am 5'2" 115lbs and the small fit great. It also wasn't short or too long on me.
The color was beutiful but the size tan Small Er than expected.

Very nice for work or dinner or just wanting to look cute and need a warm short dress. Hits at the top of my knee-I'm 5'7 and 240. I ordered the xl and wore it with  Chinchilla fur vest, some thigh boot, low heel very casual . If the others are same material, I will order other colors.

I got the black and white striped piece and it looks really cute. I like the boho type of stripe, something a little different. It seems well made. The fabric feel is super creepy though and not appropriate for this garment. I’m not sure what this fabric would be good for actually, but it catches on my hands like microfiber does and I am afraid of how it will wear over time. Too risky, it just needs to go back.
I really like the way this looks. Definitely feels like you're dressed casually, but looks like you put in some effort.
Looks terrible on. The shoulders are too big and it's very boxy, even on a curvy girl.

If I size up to fit hips, it will be way too sloopy on shoulders, as the shoulder seams already sit off my shoulder.  No pockets.If your hips are smaller than your bust,  I'd highly recommend.  Otherwise keep scrolling.
This dress is very similar to the Spanx Air Essentials material. Fits true to size.

Loved this dress SO much that I bought one for my sister for Christmas and then bought myself 4 more in different colors and patterns.  GREAT dress to dress up or down. Very thick fabric, washable…LOVE it!
This dress is definitely more tight fitted! The material is also thicker than I expected. Color was good but had to skip out on the rest!

I’m very particular when it comes to fabrics because my skin is very sensitive (sensory-wise). This fabric isn’t perfect but it doesn’t feel polyester-y & definitely feels comfy with the rayon. My only gripe is that the sage green color is not as bright as it is in the picture. It’s much closer to a faded military green or olive green mixed with the mutedness of gray. If I had time before my event, I would definitely change it out for a different color. I really do like the dress so I’d like to order a different color sometime!
The material of this dress was way better than I expected. Super soft and extremely smooth. Fit as expected. Great dress for the workplace if business casual

Lovely luxurious fabric, streamlined style may be worn dressy or casual. Fits perfectly . I ordered green which looks blue green beautiful color . I love it so much I will order another color . Highly recommend for it’s value and simplicity.

It is PERFECT fit is great. Very comfortable dress and the length is just right.
This sweater dress is cute and comfy. Runs a bit small.

Love the jonny collar--super cute.  Ordered the XL as a 14 with larger bust and it's too big at the shoulders.  Hip is exactly where I like it.  Will be sending back for the L to see if the fit is better.  The material is a thick jersey with a silky texture inside and out.  Not sure how well it will breather and if it will be too hot.

It’s a thick and comfortable material. Fits perfect I got a medium and the length it’s perfect right above my knee.

I love to wear dresses year ‘round, and thankfully I live in the South so most of the time I can make dresses work in the winter, although I may need to add regular or fleece lined tights from time to time to keep my legs warm.  This dress is a good option for me, not just because it works with the climate I live in, but also because I’m 5’3” tall, so the dress hits right at the knee for me, which is where I want it. Also, I work from home, and this is a comfortable option that still looks nice on camera because it has a collar.  It’s a very plain dress, but can be easily elevated with a belt, a silk scarf, etc. I use a capsule wardrobe and this is a great addition.  The only things I don’t like are that it doesn’t have pockets, and the fabric is a little odd - more like scuba fabric than the sweatshirt fabric I was expecting.  I’ll probably get it in another color if it’s available in the same 27% discount price at which I purchased the blue one. The original price is much too high for the quality of this dress.
Good quality and fits great.  Very flattering. Can be dressed up with boots or dressed down with tennis shoes. It's a great buy.
Very warm and comfy, but runs a bit large. Thick sweatshirt type fabric, and not at all see through. I didn't find it t I be flattering for me.

I bought this for a trip to Maine and when I put it on it was awful. There's no shape to it so it makes you look larger than you are. I went to go return it but was passed the return date so I'm stuck with it, it'll go in the donate pile for sure.

LOVE! I can't wait to wear this! Pair it with knee-high boots and thick sunnies. Such fun! I went a size up as was recommended by others. It is a little loose, not too much though, but I adore the drape of it this way. Thank you ladies out there for the advice! I don't think it would look as great if it was fitted on me because the neckline is pretty high. (high necklines + tight dresses = an instant football player look unless you are a size zero and... I am not)
Made fine, didn't suit my shape at all. Had to return

I am 5 foot eight and 125 pounds. I was looking for a T-shirt or sweater dress that I could wear with over the knee boots or with sneakers. This dress fits the bill. It fits great in the shoulders and sleeve length as well. I bought two colors, the rest caramel and black. I am thinking of ordering dark green as well.
I washed it before wearing and it appears there are stains already on it. I’m thinking the color bled. Paid for a dress in never going to get to wear.
The fabric is amazing. It’s long enough that I’m comfortable. The touch of it is so soft. I ordered a size up so that it would be big and I absolutely love it.
True to size dress that is well made.  The material is substantial and the fit is true to size.  Great buy!
Material is great, good quality

评论概述: Sexy, cute and fun sweater dress
评论详情: My wife received this Navy Blue Sweatshirt Dress recently, and it’s an absolute winner! She chose the XL based on the sizing chart, and it fits her perfectly, accentuating her figure in the most flattering way. She loves that it’s versatile enough to dress up or down—she’s already worn it with a cute belt and tried pairing it with a long necklace and wrist jewelry for a bit of flair. The color options were fantastic, but the navy blue was her favorite, and it looks amazing in person.  The fabric feels lovely and soft, with none of the odd odors or stiffness that sometimes come with new clothing. It’s ready to wear right out of the package, which is always a plus! If you’re thinking about sizing, take a few moments to measure yourself and check the chart—this one is true to size, but each sweater dress can vary. She finds this dress perfect for cooler days and evenings and recommends it highly for anyone looking for a cute, modest, and feminine option that feels as good as it looks. A definite go-to for fall and winter!
I'm 5'6 and the L was a little short for me, I have a bigger bum.
I really wanted to keep this but too short without wearing leggings under it.
Was looking for a easy fit dress to wear with boots. Dress ran small, clingy. Material would be very easy to snag. Waited too late to try on. Would have returned but now too late.
Although I loved the comfort of this dress, the boxy cut made it too big and not flattering. The color was rich and the quality of the material was nice.
Love the weight and thickness of this.  Very flattering
Fabric quality is not good. It feels like polyester and cheap. Would not recommend
Fits great so soft
Like the dress.  Fabric is excellent quality

评论概述: Nice dupe of popular upscale retailer
评论详情: Bought this dress in black with rather low expectations. I was pleasantly surprised that for the price, it’s a nice dress. I am 5’6” and run about 140-150 lbs with an athletic build and broad shoulders. I typically wear a small or medium just depending on the cut and if I want a slimmer or looser fit. I ordered a Medium in this and it was spot on. Flattering, but not so loose that it was frumpy.  Outside is soft and smooth, but the inside is a bit rougher than expected. For the price,  it’s a great dupe for something you’d find at Tuckernuck.

评论概述: Dreams are made of this dress!!!!
评论详情: This dress fit perfectly !!! Not too tight not too loose!!! Extremely well made, flattering and SO COMFORTABLE!!!!! I plan on buying this in other colors!!!!

This cute soft dress is lined too! I was so disappointed it didnt fit me. There is just too much extra material making up the back side of the dress that I couldn't even belt it like I saw in a photo. From behind it looks like a sack. Sadly had to return it. They make another style (round neck) with a dart in the back that makes it hang nicely. It's a different material than this and feels more casual.
Great look and thickness as this dress is well made. The fit is perfect. Love the dress. Very Prompt Service!

What I didn't like about this dress is that it is more of a shiny, silky fabric on the outside. I was for some reason expecting it to be sweatshirt like material. The fabric is thick, and will be warm to wear in the fall/winter paired with a pair of leggings in any color, as I got the black dress. It really isn't a dress that is flattering. It is more made for comfort, or maybe even lounging around the house in. If you can dress casual, or business casual at work, this dress would be perfect for that as well.
True to size and very comfortable. Quality material that accents your shape. Thick enough for winter but can also be worn during the summer.
Needs pockets! Really cute though and nice material! Needed XL!

评论概述: Love the dress, but pilling after 3 washes
评论详情: I love this dress, shape is great, comfort ,etc  and I was prepared to order it in a ton of colors but I took it out of the wash this weekend(3rd wash ever) and it has pilling all over the body and inner arms of the dress. It’s going to look too beat up to wear after one more wash. Doesn’t feel worth it to only get 3-4 wears out of it.

评论概述: I'll probably not wear it much but...
评论详情: So first of all, I wanted the olive green color, and it is definitely just charcoal gray...so color is off. I am a thicker gal and bought a large because I tend to buy things too big since losing weight, but this is a little "slimmer" fit than I hoped compared to the intended "oversized" fit advertised. I do have a fupa, so I'll probably wear some light shape wear just to help smooth out the tummy/pelvic area lol. The material is great though! It is a thicker "slick" soft fabric that I didn't expect honestly, and super comfortable feeling. I will say out of about 4 new Amazon dresses, my bf actually liked this one most when it came to how flattering they looked. It would be super cute with some white sneakers!

The fabric on this dress is thick enough that the material lays very flat on the collar.  Even when it comes right out of the wash, the collar looks great.  The dress is comfortable and easy to wear.  The material is soft and doesn’t cling to your body.
Bought as a tunic top. Fits well. Unfortunately , it has no pockets and given its length it is inconvenient when reaching for a tissue or your phone.

评论概述: Love with Tennis Shoes or boots
评论详情: So comfortable. I wear it in lieu of jeans or to church. Very versatile. It does run a little short so be prepared to wear spanx shorts and wear it with confidence.  I got it in a light color and immediately got something on it. A little pretreat and it was good to go. I am a med to large and the medium fit great. Material is thick and the dress is flattering not boxy.

The dress came in a shrink wrap package. Very creased and wrinkled. But it fit and was cute. I just washed on delicate & hardly any of the wrinkles came out. It’s really not wearable but now I can’t return.

This dress runs large and the color is nothing like I was expecting. I ordered a green that looked beautiful in the photos, but in person I don't know what color is but not wat I wanted. The length is similar as in the model (short) but the overall fit is larger, even the sleeves are too long.  Collar is nice and material is soft, but very heavy and weird texture and feel. I'll try to see how it looks with a belt (just like the model) but I was hoping on wearing this dress on its own with some knee high boots. But I don't think it is very flattering on me.

I love the style, fit, and fabric of this dress.  It is packable and easy to travel in.  It can be used multiple times and dressed up or down.  Nice rich black fabric.
Super cute.  Can dress up or down.  Expect the wrinkles, just take a steam iron to it and it's perfect!

This sweatshirt is okay. It doesn’t look as nice in person as it does on screen. The blue is a different kind of navy and I don’t like the way it looks with denim. It arrived very wrinkled; I must admit I wasn’t thrilled after receiving it so I haven’t washed it yet. Being that I live in the Southwest, it’s been too hot to even consider wearing something this heavy. Now, this is just my opinion and it could be that my expectations were a little too high. At this time, I can’t recommend it and would not buy another one.

This dress is very flattering. Not tight or clingy at all. The fabric is substantial and so soft/smooth. It feels almost like a soft scuba material, very stretchy too. I like that it skims over my problem midsection. And it doesn’t have pockets to stick out weirdly. I’m looking forward to wearing it as the weather cools. I purchased a size medium and at 5‘1“ it comes just above my knee, which is perfect.

Super soft dress, thick enough, and not see-through.  In my opinion, product runs slightly large.  I'm 5'4" , weigh 140lbs, and ordered the medium.  It was kinda baggy all around, so returned for a small.  The dress isn't supposed to be "tight" but the small fit better, still loose, but not baggy on the bottom like the medium was.  I will also add it's a short dress, so anyone taller than maybe 5'6" might find the length somewhere about 5 inches above the knee.  Love it, so probably going to order another color!

I get clothing from Amazon infrequently.  I need to try items on, feel them, check out the quality.  Online purchasing makes that difficult, so I avoid it the majority of the time.I read the only 2 reviews (at the time I ordered this shirt/dress) and my review will echo what I read.  The feel of this is amazing.  The material is on the heavier side (great for the upcoming colder months!), the outside material is silky soft.  The inside material is SOOOOOO comfortable.  Honestly, I was surprised at how comfortable it is.  It can be worn as a dress (it falls right above my knees) or with leggings.I got a Medium and it fits great for my body shape.  I'm 5'4" and have an hour glass shape (150# range).I absolutely recommend this product!  I'm confident you will see and feel the quality of the shirt/dress.  It is worth the price.

I wanted to love this but it is just so so. The fit is a bit frumpy on me. I think for the taller person it would be more of a mini and would give it a little more of an edgy vibe. The fabric is very soft and it washes up well. Pretty much wash and wear which is nice.
Slightly oversized
This dress looks great and is very comfortable. I’m 5’0” and 150lbs.  I got a large in the light gray.
The dress is comfy and cute but SUPER short!

Indoors, the color looks like gray but when held up to the sunlight, there is a hint of green!  It is definitely not the dark green shown!  Although the color is off, I will be keeping it since the fit and material are great!

评论概述: A Great Look for a Plus Size Figure
评论详情: This dress surprised me in all the right ways!  First, it was so soft and comfortable to wear, but the surprise came with the fit.  It is loose, but not oversized, so that it is totally figure flattering and slimming without being or looking too tight.  It also hides rather than highlights any "problem areas," providing a smooth look and feel.  My hips are 2" past the chart measurement for the size I ordered, and it still falls freely over my tummy and backside - no "hang ups."  I'm on the shorter side, so it's a "just right" length too.  The color is a rich, deep red - very pretty and not at all "flat" or "dull" - perfect for the fall and winter seasons with a heavier, warm fabric.  It is well made and not at all transparent.  The style is easy to dress up or down with different accessories.  It's a win for me!

I did not keep this dress.  It does not have pockets and has a square cut to it.  I wanted to so love this dress but for me it was too boxy.  Size is true to fit.  The material is heavy so you can wear it for winter.  It just did not make me feel good bc of the cut.  However, the material is very nice and I would recommend it.
Picked this sweatshirt up for my partner to wear as the cooler months come in. Look great! Fit true to size, no issues.

This dress is AMAZING. The material is buttery soft, thick, and feels like a high quality sweatshirt. It fits like a glove, hugging in all the right places while still relaxed. Length is cute but still modest. I'm a gamecocks fan and this dress is about to be a football tailgate staple!

This dress is true to size — a true XL! I’ve seen this dress described as “sweatshirt material” but I’d have to disagree. It feels like a thicker dri-fit/scuba type of material. It’s not super heavy, which makes for a good fall item. I am 5’4” and it hit just above my knees. When I raised my arms up, it comes to about mid-thigh. It’s very loose and breathable without looking ill-fitting. Finally, the v-cut neckline runs pretty standard to that of a polo. Happy buying!

评论概述: Effortless Style and Comfort – A Must-Have Fall Dress!
评论详情: I’m so impressed with the WIHOLL Women’s Long Sleeve Lapel Collared V-Neck Sweatshirt Dress! This dress is the perfect blend of casual chic and cozy comfort, making it an ideal choice for fall.  The loose fit is incredibly flattering, allowing for easy movement while still looking polished. The lapel collar and V-neck design add a touch of sophistication to what could otherwise be a standard sweatshirt dress. The solid color options are versatile and easy to accessorize, making it a great piece for various occasions.  The fabric is soft and warm, perfect for cooler weather without being too heavy. It’s a great layering piece that pairs well with leggings, boots, or even a belt to cinch the waist for a more tailored look. I am 5'0", 118 pounds, and the size small fit me with room that I can use a belt for a more stylish look.  I cant wait for cooler weather to wear this for casual outings or lounging at home. It’s comfortable, stylish, and easy to care for—just what I was looking for in a fall dress.  Overall, the WIHOLL Sweatshirt Dress has exceeded my expectations. It’s a fantastic addition to my wardrobe and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a blend of style and comfort.
I paired this with a chain belt and it was so cute. If your legs are long, it may seem a little short.. wear spanx underneath for extra assurance.
It fits perfect with or without a belt. The material is super comfy as well.

评论概述: Soft and Stylish, But a Bit Thin
评论详情: This is a really nice sweater dress that's perfect for fall! The dress is soft and comfortable, with a lovely color that adds a chic touch to any outfit. The V-neck with the foldover collar gives it a stylish, casual vibe that's great for various occasions, from work to casual outings. I love how versatile it is—you can dress it up with boots or keep it simple with sneakers. However, I took away one star because the fabric is slightly thinner than expected for a sweater dress, making it less warm and less structured than I anticipated. Overall, it's still a beautiful, easy-to-wear piece for cooler weather!

评论概述: The Length Might Be a Problem...
评论详情: I'm 5'6", 34D bust, 26" waist, long torso, and a size 2/4 for reference. I ordered my typical size S and it is generally true to size but too short - hits me slightly above mid-thigh. if you're taller than me, this will be too short for you too. It's an interesting poly/rayon blend fabric with a sportswear look. Its on the thicker side and not transparent. Feels silky and soft against the skin.
